Uses of Interface
com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.IApplicationTopology

  • Packages that use IApplicationTopology 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.engine.app
    Provides a concrete rules engine that uses the SharedTuplePlatform to exchange tuples between engines.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform
    Provides the basic framework for sharing data within or between JVMs.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.beans
    Provides extensions to the ISharedDataPlatform to support the sharing of serialized Java objects.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology
    Provides framework for physical and logical topology representation and monitoring.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.application
    Provides a framework for applications to define logical topolical relationships between nodes.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples
    Provides extensions to the ISharedDataPlatform to support the sharing of relational data.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.dataHandler
    Provides a data caching and de-duplication framework.
    com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian
    Provides a distributed neighbor monitoring system for the gaian database nodes.

      Create the distributed platform with the given inputs, and if the storage is null, then use the one configured in DSMConfig (the constructor requires storage to not be null).

    • Uses of IApplicationTopology in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.application

      Classes in com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.application that implement IApplicationTopology 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DirectedTopology
      Enables a directed (or hierarchical) logical topology.
      class  NeighborOnlyTopology
      Defines a topology which only provides access to the neighbors as defined by the IPhysicalTopology.
      class  StaticApplicationTopology
      Provides support for mesh, tree, and chain topologies via a file specification.
      class  TreeTopology
      Implements a tree topology using the DirectedTopology.
      class  UnstructuredTopology
      Uses the IPhysicalTopology to determine reachability and neighbor-ness.
